title: Spellthief's Edge bug
body: Basic attacks on champions while using spellthief's edge doesn't seem to be giving the extra gold. Abilties work with the passive however, and im not sure if its only a bug with morgana. Please look into it!

replies.body: Was working last night for me, were you auto attacking with no stacks?
and started working when i put tormented soil. But still didn't work for basic attacks
